release.action: Built a new rome-modules-0.2.jar because the old one was made with java 1.5. The new one was built with jdk 1.4

Added a new framework, RSSProducer for producing RSS feeds via plugable interface and a RSS servlet. Read the wiki entry http://trac.idega.is/projects/idegaweb/wiki/RSSProducer for details. updated to com.idega.slide v.3.1.2
RSSTicker and RSSViewer hidden layer bugfixes

Many RSSTicker improvements and bugfixes. Now the date for each rss item is read from dc:date and the datestring can be formatted by a pattern. Live interval updating the RSS via ajax is now implemented for the RSSTicker.
Fixed URI bug in the RSSTicker
First release of module to be included in ePlatform 3.1 Release.
Built on the Rome API for supporting RSS 1.0,2.0 and Atom formats.
Fetches and aggregates feeds into the Local WebDav repository.
